overview:
In 2010, she founded Online Business Development, an European-based agency-network specialized in Online Marketing, E-Commerce and Social Media.

After 5 years dedication for zanox, one of the global market leaders for performance-based online marketing, she wanted to offer her online expertise to a broader customer base of website publishers and online shops.

In her former position of Global Industry Manager, she was responsible for international Publishers (Affiliate Partners). She supported the best websites and portals worldwide in their online development and help them to maximize their online earnings and ROI.

As she worked with the most competent specialists in online marketing and e-commerce around Europe, she has gathered them under the network Online Business Development, so that experts can work on their online project to meet their goal with high quality services.

As a graduate of a Master in International Management at the renowned french business school ESC Toulouse in France and a German university degree in management of innovation, she can develop for your project an online strategy that will make your online business successful. As a European, she will support you in the internationalization of your activity on the Internet.

Her specialities: Specialties Online Marketing, E-Commerce, Social Media, Online Monetisation, Online Monetization, Internationalisation, Internationalization, Online Strategy, Training, Consulting, Workshops, Online Advertising, Internet, Online Promotion, Display, Affiliate Marketing, SEM, SEO, Media Buying, Webcontrolling, Webanalytics, E-Business, Facebook, Translation, Localization, Export, intercultural projects, French, German, European Market, SMO, SMM, Advertising Campaigns, E-Mail Marketing, CPA,

degrees.subject: Technology and Innovation Management, International Trade
International Management, International Marketing and Communication
